name: The Witcher: Enhanced Edition

files.game: N/A:Select the Windows setup file downloaded from GOG

content:
files:
- game: N/A:Select the Windows setup file downloaded from GOG
game:
  arch: win32
  exe: drive_c/GOG Games/The Witcher Enhanced Edition/launcher.exe
  prefix: $GAMEDIR
installer:
- task:
    arch: win32
    name: create_prefix
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- task:
    arch: win32
    executable: game
    name: wineexec
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- task:
    app: d3dx9_35
    arch: win32
    name: winetricks
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
    silent: true
- task:
    arch: win32
    key: CheckFloatConstants
    name: set_regedit
    path: HKEY_CURRENT_USER\Software\Wine\Direct3D
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
    value: enabled
